## JsPlumbListOptions interface

Constructor options for a list.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface JsPlumbListOptions 
```

|  [anchor?](./browser-ui-lists.jsplumblistoptions.anchor) | AnchorSpec | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional spec for the anchor to use when parking connections in response to a scroll. |
